content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** join my fb group 1 to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns i named this scarf sea breeze because its texture and colors remind me of the beach when the sea is quiet and flat the interesting texture of this infinity scarf is created by combining several different stitches such as front and back loop double_crochet and the fun puff the scarf is crocheted in the round and is wrapped twice around the neck skill level - intermediate the pattern is written using english u s terminology the scarf is crocheted with dk yarn if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2020 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this pattern are property of gootie designs you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
